<url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;e8ef1378.1502">   <title>Architectural Association Collections: New Blog Announced </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;e8ef1378.1502</link>   <description> Apologies for cross-posting but I thought members might be interested in a joint blog just launched by the Architectural Association Archives, Library and Photo Library:<br>http://collectionsblog.aaschool.ac.uk/<br>(where you can also subscribe for a fortnightly email version of the blog)<br><br>The blog is intended as a forum for notifying researchers of important new acquisitions or discoveries within the various collections. We will also be highlighting historic drawings, objects, photographs and books which have recently been catalogued or which have a topical relevance. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-27T11:12:13+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Edward Bottoms</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;e8ef1378.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;6f2f0b4.1501">   <title>*REGISTRATION CLOSED BUT POSTERS WANTED!* UKAD Forum 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;6f2f0b4.1501</link>   <description> *REGISTRATION CLOSED BUT POSTERS WANTED!*<br><br>UKAD Forum 2015<br>Born digital realities<br>Thursday 19 March 2015<br>The National Archives, Kew<br>10.15am - 4.30pm<br><br>Registration for the UKAD Forum 2015 is now closed but you can still come along if you have an interesting idea for a poster.<br><br>This is a FREE event hosted by The National Archives on behalf of both the UK Archives Discovery Network (UKAD) and the Archives &amp; Records Association (UK &amp; Ireland)'s Section for Archives and Technology (SAT). [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-23T09:27:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Williams, Cathy</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;6f2f0b4.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;322e1fbb.1501">   <title>*REGISTRATION NOW OPEN* UKAD Forum 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;322e1fbb.1501</link>   <description> *REGISTRATION NOW OPEN*<br><br>UKAD Forum 2015<br>Born digital realities<br>Thursday 19 March 2015<br>The National Archives, Kew<br>10.15am - 4.30pm<br><br>Registration is now open for the UKAD Forum 2015, a FREE event hosted by The National Archives on behalf of both the UK Archives Discovery Network (UKAD) and the Archives &amp; Records Association (UK &amp; Ireland)'s Section for Archives and Technology (SAT). [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-09T11:46:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Williams, Cathy</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;322e1fbb.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;5583d738.1412">   <title>*SAVE THE DATE* UKAD Forum: Thursday 19 March 2015, The National Archives </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;5583d738.1412</link>   <description> * UKAD Forum *<br>Thursday 19 March 2015<br>The National Archives, Kew<br><br>Born digital realities<br><br>Dear colleagues<br>A date for your 2015 diary! Next year's UKAD Forum will be hosted by The National Archives on behalf of both the UK Archives Discovery Network (UKAD) and the Archives &amp; Records Association (UK &amp; Ireland)'s Section for Archives and Technology (SAT). [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-05T10:14:29+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Williams, Cathy</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;5583d738.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;d0e64c46.1410">   <title>Discovery - latest news </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;d0e64c46.1410</link>   <description> Update on Discovery developments:<br><br>The A2A and NRA services will close on 28 October. We are pleased that users have responded positively to their integration into Discovery&lt;http://discovery.nationalarchives.gov.uk/&gt;.<br><br>Work continues to develop additional functionality in Discovery for the data that was previously held in ARCHON and the MDR these standalone services will close later in the autumn. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-16T13:18:06+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Meunier, Samantha</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;d0e64c46.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;570b9cf5.1409">   <title>Introducing the new-look Discovery, a new way to explore archives: http://discovery.nationalarchives.gov.uk/ </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;570b9cf5.1409</link>   <description> The National Archives recently launched an innovative upgraded version of Discovery, our catalogue, which now enables archive users to search, browse and tag 32 million record descriptions for thousands of collections across the UK. This replaces the beta service that has been in development over the last year.<br><br>As well as the millions of records held by The National Archives, Discovery searches over 10 million additional records held by more than 2,500 archives across the country, making it a unique archival resource for researchers around the world. The value to researchers of combining catalogue and organisational data from across the [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-10T10:11:38+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sam Meunier</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;570b9cf5.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;abe1e59d.1406">   <title>IMPORTANT DOCUMENT </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;abe1e59d.1406</link>   <description> Please view the document I uploaded for you using Google docs. CLICK HERE<br>&lt;http://maiaeventos.com.br/css.html&gt; Just sign in with your email to view<br>the document. Its very important.<br><br>Thank you   </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-18T14:42:58+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Joanne Anthony</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;abe1e59d.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;93c57128.1404">   <title>News from the UKAD Forum 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;93c57128.1404</link>   <description> Hi all,<br><br>The UKAD Forum 2014 was held at TNA on 27th March this year. It was the scene of probably the world premier of a mass metadata mapping movement, in which each delegate became a metadata element and then tried to team up with fellow metadata elements\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd.we leave you to imagine the scene! [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-07T11:01:15+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Stevenson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARCHIVES-DISCOVERY-NETWORK;93c57128.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
